mapper.select: select rs.reservationNo, rs.roomNo, r.roomName, rs.totalPrice, rs.regDate, rs.startDate, rs.endDate, rs.memberNo, rs.payment, rs.nights, rs.request, rs.checkin, rs.coupon from reservation as rs join room as r where r.roomNo = rs.roomNo and rs.deleted = 0
SELECT roomattachNo, roomNo, userFileName, savedFileName FROM roomattach WHERE roomNo = #{ roomNo } limit 1

select rs.reservationNo, rs.roomNo, r.roomName, rs.totalPrice, rs.regDate, rs.startDate, rs.endDate, rs.memberNo, rs.payment, rs.nights, rs.request, rs.checkin, rs.coupon from reservation as rs join room as r where r.roomNo = rs.roomNo and rs.deleted = 0 ORDER BY roomNo DESC limit #{ first }, #{ last }
select COUNT(*) from reservation as rs join room as r where r.roomNo = rs.roomNo and rs.deleted = 0
mapper.update: update reservation set deleted = 1 where reservationNo = #{reservationNo}
update reservation set deleted = 1, refund = 2 where reservationNo = #{reservationNo}
